Portfolio.desc: A static website Created by me to showcase my projects. It was built using pure HTML, CSS and JavaScript! You can check it out on github by clicking the link below.

NextPortfolio.desc: A recreation of my portfolio site using new technologies, such as: NextJS and TypeScript!

ReactFlowers (in progress).desc: Recently I have started to get into taking pictures (mostly flowers!) and hence decided to make a project focused on creating a gallery for displaying my pictures!

LiveCommerce.desc: Currently in progress, me along with 6 people are currently working on a Live commerce platform, where shops and creators can showcase and sell their products live! With another team member, I'm responsible for the frontend part.
